column4: Hi all, is it possible to switch one of the workspaces to an external screen and one of the workspaces to the monitor of a laptop ?
xinerama is a slightly different approach, and really extends one workspace across two screens
but the 'workspace' is an extended desktop
this would be nice, i have never looked into this.
have you used xinerama, I have tried to man both xinerama and libxinerama (which shows installed in synaptic) but no response
yes i have, though years ago. i followed this howto. http://linuxreviews.org/howtos/xfree/Xinerama-HOWTO/en/index.html
MPlayer interrupted by signal 11 in module: decode_audio
ouch.. and this same dvd plays in vlc?
apparently this is a known problem. psychonate has posted the exact same issue: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=46138&highlight=mplayer+dvd+crash
it provides header information largely, and regulates playback. you probably know it as format yes.
sudo == do as super-user (or "super user do"). this is used for executing commands that require administrative priveledges.
topyli it was working up untill now without sudo, will restart a bit later
